name: Bulk Move of Resources
description: Moving the selected resources to a destination Project. The first parameter is the destination project, and the rest of parameters are used to filter the resources to be lected. All provided conditions are applied to the filter.

inputs.name: destination-id
inputs.description: Project ID used as destination to move the resources. If empty, a new project named "Unknown" will be created and the selected resources will be moved there.

inputs.name: project-id
inputs.description: Project ID of the resources to be selected. If empty, the filter is not applied (default).

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Tag contained in the selected resources. If empty, the filter is not applied (default).

inputs.name: filter-expr
inputs.description: Map of parameters to be used as filter (e.g. {"name": "iris"}). If empty, the filter is not applied (default).)

inputs.name: resource-types
inputs.description: List of types for the resources to be selected (e.g. ["source", "ensemble"]). If empty, the filter is not applied (default).

inputs.name: dry-run
inputs.description: If set to 'true', the resources will not be moved and their IDs will be logged (default).
